alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:08PM MST until January 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains zones. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a break in the snow tonight, before redeveloping Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
